DOC.brief_summary: Reducing length labor highly desirable goal intrapartum care , perspective maternal fetal well-being , provider birth service . Avoiding long , protract labor entail short exposure pain anxiety stress would translate major improvement maternal satisfaction child birth experience . The purpose study determine effectiveness metoclopramide reduce duration spontaneous labor among nulliparous woman manage accord standard intrapartum protocol .
DOC.brief_title: Use Antiemetic Shorten Length Labor Nulliparous Women
DOC.detailed_description: Women fulfill study inclusion exclusion criterion agree include study randomize assign receive either intravenous injection 10mg metoclopramide ( Group 1 ) volume placebo , i.e . 0.9 % sodium chloride ( Group2 ) . Randomization achieve use computer generate randomization sequence . Allocation 1:1 ratio . Record group allocation maintain resident physician whose responsibility randomization draw injection , direct involvement intrapartum decision making . After history physical examination , participant take select medication slowly IV 2 min , assign medication repeat every two hour maximum three dos . Monitoring fetal well-being labor progress Partographic representation perform . Management labor accord labor delivery standard protocol , labor dilatation progress appropriately , i.e . cervical dilatation rate < 1cm/hour , amniotomy perform membrane intact . Oxytocin augmentation consider rupture membrane cervix remain unchanged two consecutive pelvic examination conduct two hour apart . Oxytocin infusion start 5mIU/min increase 5mIU/min every 15min achieve seven contraction 15 min , maximal rate oxytocin 30Miu/min . The following parameter record every patient : - Timing metoclopramide placebo injection - Timing full dilatation cervix - Duration first stage labor - Duration second stage labor - Duration third stage labor - Mode delivery - Injection delivery interval - Cervical dilatation rate - Neonatal condition birth
DOC.criteria: Primigravida Singleton pregnancy Term gestation i.e . 37 42 week Sure reliable date Vertex presentation , occipitoanterior position Spontaneous onset labor Regular uterine contraction every 5 min , last 20 sec Cervical dilatation 35cm With without rupture membranes No evidence maternal fetal distress Malpresentations Malpositions Multifetal pregnancy Cephalopelvic disproportion history cervical surgery injury Hypersensitivity metoclopramide
